A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gets 1 star for great visual effects. Other than that\, it's by far the worst Star Wars film to date. The writing is atrocious and full of holes. The story goes absolutely nowhere. It's complete and utter ignorance of established Star Wars lore is insulting.  A bad movie on it's own\, but an even worse Star Wars movie.  Avoid this movie like the plague.
